sentences.en: Add parsley and season with salt and pepper to taste.
If desired season with salt pepper, curry, parsley, or hot sauce.
sentences.cn: 如遇菜蔬枯竭期盐青椒, 咖哩, 芫荽或者辣酱.

sentences.en: It's made principally from parsley, tarragon and vinegar , beaten with egg yolk.
sentences.cn: 它主要是由欧芹, 尤蒿和腊烧制; 再用鸡蛋黄搅拌而成.

sentences.en: Nutmeg, parsley and cider all complement the flavour of these beans well.
sentences.cn: 肉豆蔻、西芹和苹果酒都能很好地突出这些豆子的味道。

sentences.en: Parsley is probably the most commonly used of all herbs.
sentences.cn: 欧芹可能是用得最多的一种药草。

sentences.en: Penne with traditional meat sauce, grated Parmesan and parsley.
sentences.cn: 香浓肉酱 、 特制肉肠及帕玛森芝士.

sentences.en: Remove from the heat, add the parsley, toss and serve at once.
sentences.cn: 端离炉子，加上欧芹，颠起翻面后就立刻上桌。

sentences.en: Spoon the onion mixture over steaks; sprinkle with parsley.
sentences.cn: 把洋葱混合物舀在牛排上, 撒上欧芹.

sentences.en: Sprinkle with parsley, sesame, can also add hot peppers.
sentences.cn: 撒上香菜 、 芝麻 、 也可加入辣椒.

sentences.en: Stuffed Grape Leaves with lamb, rice, pine nuts, dill, onion and parsley.
sentences.cn: 新鲜的葡萄叶卷以羊肉, 米饭, 松仁, 莳萝, 洋葱,欧芹的完美结合.

sentences.en: The turkey was served with a garnish of parsley.
sentences.cn: 做好的火鸡上面配上芫荽菜做点缀.

sentences.en: Toss to mix through then over with the chopped parsley before serving.
sentences.cn: 兜匀后洒上欧芹末即可食用.

sentences.en: Yet parsley is asource of vitamins and other nutrients.
sentences.cn: 然而,荷兰芹还含有丰富的维生素和其他营养物质.

trans.tran_en: a herb with curly leaves, used in cooking or as decoration on food
